name: El Piraguero (Demo)
description:
A 2D point-and-click adventure game. You play as a young man who navigates the island of Puerto Rico trying to reunite a lone snow cone cart with its owner, while also reconnecting with his culture.

This game is still only a demo.

Made in Unity.

Art and writing by Miranda Juncos

Programming by Elijah Cobb, Nick Fletcher and Jamie Camera

Music by Raymond Demers

Additional voices by Isak Romero


I wanna thank my entire Degree Project class, my teacher, and my friends for supporting me through this big change. I wouldn't have been able to make such an ambitious project on short notice without everyone's help. Please check out the people who worked on this game with me, they're all amazing and crazy talented!
